1. Adobe Premiere Pro is getting generative AI video tools — and hopefully OpenAI's Sora  The Verge
  2. Adobe Announces New AI Tools For Premiere Pro  Forbes
  3. Adobe Is Buying Videos for Cheap to Train Its Sora Competitor  PCMag
  4. Adobe Premiere Pro's new AI tools blew my mind. Watch them in action for yourself  ZDNet
  5. Adobe's new generative AI tools for video are absolutely terrifying  Mashable

item.title: A.I. Made These Movies Sharper. Critics Say It Ruined Them. - The New York Times
